name: Mission Economic Development Agency
description: MEDA offers free services to low- and moderate-income families, with a geographic focus on the San Francisco Bay Area. They neither solicit clients outside of the State of California nor charge for any of our services. Help is free. You should never pay for loan modification services. MEDA offers Housing Opportunities, Free Tax Preparation, Financial Capability, Business Development, Workforce Development and more.
